author: noelgrandin
msg: Greg Brown introduced some kind of paint/event rate-limiting logic in revision 778222,
but it interacts badly with mouse/window-handling because it means that a window
can miss a mouse-enter/mouse-leave event which wreaks havoc with drag-and-drop

msg: Fix high CPU load caused by tight(ish) loop when client breaks the connection and stops reading data
